00037 #ifndef COMMONPARSER_HPP
00038 #define COMMONPARSER_HPP
00039 
00040 #include "parser-types.hpp"
00041 #include "../rtt-config.h"
00042 
00043 namespace RTT { namespace scripting
00044 {
00045 
00052   class RTT_SCRIPTING_API CommonParser
00053   {
00054       std::string lastparsedident;
00055   public:
00056       // The characters of an identifier after the first char.
00057       chset<> identchar;
00058 
00059       symbols<nil_t> keywordstable;
00060       // parses any reserved keyword
00061       rule_t keyword,keywords,endofkeyword;
00062 
00063       // the normal identifier throws an error if it fails to match
00064       // because a keyword was used.  Normally this is no problem, but
00065       // if it really is, use notassertingidentifier.
00066       rule_t idr;
00067       lexeme_rule_t idlr;
00068       rule_t identifier;  
00069       rule_t templ;       
00070       rule_t tidentifier; 
00071       rule_t notassertingidentifier; 
00072       lexeme_rule_t lexeme_identifier; 
00073       lexeme_rule_t lexeme_notassertingidentifier; 
00074       rule_t type_name;
00076 
00080       rule_t eos;
00081       rule_t notassertingeos;
00082       lexeme_rule_t leos;
00083 
00085       bool skipeol;
00086       functor_parser<eol_skip_functor> skipper;
00088 
00089       CommonParser();
00090       ~CommonParser();
00091 
00092       void seenillegalidentifier();
00093   };
00094 }}
00095 
00096 #endif
